flounder.physics

Class AABB

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.physics.AABB

  • public class AABB
extends java.lang.Object
    A 3D axis-aligned bounding box.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AABB()
      Creates a new blank 3D AABB.
      AABB(AABB source)
      Creates a new AABB from another AABB source.
      AABB(Vector3f minExtents, Vector3f maxExtents)
      Creates a new mixed AABB based on it's extents.

        public static AABB scale(AABB source,
                         AABB destination,
                         Vector3f scale)
        Creates a new AABB equivalent to this, scaled away from the centre origin.
        Parameters:
        source - The source AABB.
        destination - The destination AABB or null if a new AABB is to be created.
        scale - Amount to scale up the AABB.
        Returns:
        A new AABB, scaled by the specified amounts.

                         float scaleY,

        destination - The destination AABB or null if a new AABB is to be created.
        scaleX - Amount to scale up the AABB on X.
        scaleY - Amount to scale up the AABB on Y.
        scaleZ - Amount to scale up the AABB on Z.

      • combine

        public static AABB combine(AABB left,
                           AABB right,
                           AABB destination)
        Creates an AABB that bounds both this AABB and another AABB.
        Parameters:
        left - The left source AABB.
        right - The right source AABB.
        destination - The destination AABB or null if a new AABB is to be created.
        Returns:
        An AABB that bounds both this AABB and other.

                           AABB destination,
                           float stretchX,
                           float stretchY,
                           float stretchZ)

        destination - The destination AABB or null if a new AABB is to be created.
        stretchX - The amount to stretch on the X.
        stretchY - The amount to stretch on the Y.
        stretchZ - The amount to stretch on the Z.
        Returns:
        A new AABB, stretched by the specified amounts.

      • recalculate

        public static AABB recalculate(AABB source,
                               AABB destination,
                               Vector3f position,
                               Vector3f rotation,
                               float scale)
        Creates an AABB equivalent to this, but in a new position and rotation.
        Parameters:
        source - The source AABB.
        destination - The destination AABB or null if a new AABB is to be created.
        position - The amount to move.
        rotation - The amount to rotate.
        scale - The amount to scale the object.
        Returns:
        An AABB equivalent to this, but in a new position.

        public boolean contains(AABB other)
        Tests whether another AABB is completely contained by this one.
        Parameters:
        other - The AABB being tested for containment
        Returns:
        True if other is contained by this AABB, false otherwise.
